entry.title: Haley Big24
entry.content:
title: Haley presenting at BIG 2024 conference tag:

  • award

  • talk

Haley presented a speed talk at the annual BIG 2024 conference at UBC and was awarded second place for best speed talk!
entry.summary: title: Haley presenting at BIG 2024 conference tag: award talk

entry.title: Hello world
entry.content: Welcome to our lab website! We’re a bioinformatic lab at UBC, studying single cell sequencing. Stay tuned for regular updates and news on our latest discoveries and activities!
